snippet: One bombardment hit a principal’s house, and another killed 10 students at a school, according to officials and witnesses....
abstract: Airstrikes led by Saudi Arabian military coalition kill 19 people in northern Yemen, including family of school principal and students at school.

byline.original: By SHUAIB ALMOSAWA and ROD NORDLAND
byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa reported from Sana, and Rod Nordland from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: One bombardment hit a principal’s house, and another killed 10 students at a school, according to officials and witnesses.

headline.main: Saudi Coalition Airstrikes in Yemen Kill at Least 19, Mostly Children
headline.print_headline: 19 Are Killed by Airstrikes in Yemen
